alert.note: Alert for Harvey; McPherson; Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:38AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern McPherson, Reno, western Harvey and southeastern Rice Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 238 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lyons to 7 miles southwest of Haven. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, South Hutchinson, Sterling, Halstead, Inman, Buhler, Haven, Nickerson, Burrton, Pretty Prairie, Arlington, Partridge, Windom, Abbyville, Yoder, Willowbrook, Mcpherson Airport, Hutchinson Airport and Cheney State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
